Title: Additional Sources Index
DescriptionLines: Using the **Additional Sources** feature allows the index's Map & Reduce methods to reference and use code from external source files.
With that, the index definition can be expanded to perform any complex indexing work required.

Walkthroughs.Title: Define the Map index class
DescriptionLines: * Create the Map index class - inherit from AbstractIndexCreationTask.
* This example defines a Map index on the Products collection.

Walkthroughs.Title: The Index Entry class
DescriptionLines: * The IndexEntry class defines the _index-fields per entry_ in the index.
These fields will be indexed and can be queried on.
* The _content_ for each index-field is configured in the index constructor (see next step).

Walkthroughs.Title: Define the Map
DescriptionLines: * Set `map` with the index definition string.
The Map function defines the index-fields content.
* Fields with content taken from Product document:
* product_name
* original_price
* Fields with content computed by an Additional Source:
* sale_price
* profit_price
==> Methods `CalcSalePrice` & `CalcProfitPrice` are located in an external source.
(The source is added in the next step).

Walkthroughs.Title: Set Additional Sources
DescriptionLines: * Set `additional_sources`. It is a dictionary that holds:
<any reference name, the additional source string>
* _DiscountLogic_ is just a descriptive name for the added source
* _ADDITIONAL_SOURCE_ is the _string_ representation of the additional source.
See the source used for this demo in step-6 below.
* At indexing time the content for index fields sale_price & profit_price will be computed from the relevant methods in the added source.
* The additional source code will always be visible in the _Additional Sources Tab_ in the Edit Index view in the Studio.

Walkthroughs.Title: Query for documents
DescriptionLines: * Query the 'Products' collection using the defined index.
* _RavenDB will search the index_ for the indexed terms that match the query criteria
and retrieve the matching documents from the documents store.
* The query results will include all documents from the 'Products' collection that have a calculated sale_price which is lower than the specified price.

Walkthroughs.Title: The additional source string
DescriptionLines: * This is a string representation of the `DiscountUtils` class.
* The class can be placed in an external file.
In such a case, simply stringify its contents when adding as an additional source (in step-4).
